__TOC__

* Contact: Vijay Ramachandran
* Make: Fujitsu
* Model: s6120

=== Current Issues ===
From Dapper to Feisty, everything is going okay on this laptop.

Anyway, I've no external screen to play with...

External screen and video projector work, the laptop's LCD goes upon [Fn]+F10 to enable them.
